idinfo.useconst: None provided credit is given to the Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission (PFBC) as long as the data is in its original unaltered state. If modifications are made to the data set, users are obligated to describe the types of modifications they have made. Users are not to misrepresent PFBC data sets, nor to imply that changes they (users) have made were approved by the PFBC.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

procstep.procdesc: This layer was created by selecting the appropriate lakes based on the regulation definitions from the 1:24000 National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) water bodies layer and copying them into a new layer.

qhorizpa.horizpae: Based on the 1:24000 National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) water bodies layer

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Unique identifier for the lake assigned by the PFBC (composed of the latitude and longitude location of the lake)
County where lake is located and regulated
Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
